channel.title: english translation on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in english translation on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Hosh Walon Ko Khabar Kya: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Another romantic ghazal by Jagjit Singh from Sarfarosh! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iWEzJj4Ajgc&feature=BFa **Hoshwalon Ko Khabar Kya Bekhudi Kya Cheez Hai** What do conscious people know What it is like to lose oneself

item.title: Tum Itna Jo Muskura Rahe Ho: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Continuing with the Jagjit Singh mood this autumn, here is another of his classics. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSQ2SDlNRdI&feature=BFa **Tum Itna Jo Muskura Rahe Ho Kya Gham Hai Jisko Chhupa Rahe Ho**

item.title: Benaam sa yeh dard: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: A translation after a long time! Here is a song from Jagjit Singh. Benaam sa yeh dard thahar kyon nahi jaata jo beet gaya hai vo

item.title: Main Shaayar Toh Nahi Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is one of the old goodies of Hindi music. It has a very simple structure but nice meanings. This time, the video is below the translation.
